DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to obtain recurrence rates and long-term safety data for patients who had been treating actinic keratoses on the face and scalp with 5 % Imiquimod Cream in a previous study.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Follow up Recurrence Rates of Actinic Keratoses One Year After Completion of Study 1487-IMIQ
DOC.criteria: 100% clearance of Actinic Keratosis (AK) lesions in the 1487 IMIQ study used any treatments in the previous treatment area within 24 hours prior to the followup visit
